fulltext:

 EDUCATION
HO CHI MINH UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY
SEP 2012 - JAN 2017
Major: Computer Science - Software
GPA: 7.4/10
Thesis title: Combine back-propagation and simulated annealing algorithm to train the neural
network for river flow forecasting. 
In this work, we apply two methods, first is a combine back-propagation algorithm and
randomized local search, second is a combine back-propagation algorithm and simulated
annealing algorithm to train artificial neuron network.
NGUYEN HUY KHANH
Software Engineer, Front-end

WORK EXPERIENCE
VNDEVS
MAY 2018 - PRESENT
Software Engineer, Front-end Lead
- Work as a Front-end leader.
- Manage company repos and libs.
- Config webpack, CI.
- Train new members.
- Manage tasks for team members using Scrum.
FAMICARE
OCT 2017 - MAY 2018
Senior Front-end Developer
- Work as a Senior Front-end Developer, lead front-end team.
- Develop a a big web application for medical industry using react, redux, typescript .
- Support design team with UI/UX.
- Write tests using Jest.
- Manage tasks for team members using Scrum.
SMARTDATICS
JUNE 2016 - OCT 2017
Web Developer
- Work as a full-stack developer , lead front-end team.
- Write api documents, design application's structure.
- Develop a big application for oil industry using pure javascript, jquery, d3.js.
- Build web applications using react + redux.
- Design and develop e-commerce websites using wordpress + php.
Oct 15, 1994
 Male
 +84965670854
 huykhanh.cse@gmail.com
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
Skype: huykhanh.cse
SUMMARY
Versatile Front-end Developer with 3
years of experience designing,
developing, and managing complex
sites, apps and internal frameworks.

design.
